tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very well he explains the problem and solves thoroughly. I am thankful for the help. Medication and physiotherapy are suggested based on requirement.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
“Dr. prashant sir is very friendly,I knew I was in good hands when I was told I needed to have an ACL surgery on my right knee and I was right! Dr. Prashant sir did an amazing job, sir was cares me before and after the surgery,after surgery also sir was keep in touch any time.

They have an amazing staff to support you with any queries with regards to insurance and they were upfront regarding out of pocket costs.

Overall, I am a satisfied patient and I would wholeheartedly recommend this facility to all my friends!”

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I met with an accident with complete ACL tear and went to this doctor after consulting other doctors and as per suggestion I had surgery, post surgery due to lack of co ordination between physiotherapist and doctor my physio was delayed, due to which my rehab went longer and they didn't guide properly. 
In followup reviews also there was no proper guidance due to which I developed extension lag, * **** ********* ***** ****** ** ********* ******** **** *** ********** ***** ** ****** *** ******* ** ***** ****** ** ********* ***** ** ****** ******** I trusted the doctor very much and this is end result.
I am planning for other surgery with different doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to Sparsh hospital for my Knee pain and unfortunately I was told to consult with Dr Prasanth Tejwani. I had a knee pain which is manageable and i was told to take Xray ***** *** *** * ********* **** * ********* **** ** ****** *** *** ** ********** ******* ******* ********** They forced to take an X-ray then when i came to the Dr Prasanth he said to use a Ankle bandaid and couple of medicine. He then immediately asked where i stay when i told about my location he said he comes to a clinic nearby and he started saying it seems your bones are weak you need a blood test and you can come to the nearby clinic after the test. ****** *** **** ****** *** ********* ******* *** ******** *** ********** ** ******* ******* I was told by Dr Prashant not to drive two or four wheeler and i asked him to give a letter so i can inform my manager to approve a work from home. He shouted at me saying if you go by uber or Ola whats the validity of my letter later he come to the conclusion saying our hospital do not permit to do that. * **** ****** ** *** **** * No more feed back about this Dr ** *** **** * ****** ********* *** ********* ****** **** ****** ********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Wait more than one hour, after that transfered me for the urgency and I wait more 30 min. The doctor was very rude, don't explain the problem and only push me why I am not using the protection in the knee. Nobody explain me why use or how long use. He said to plater my knee because I am not using the protection. I am not a child, if explain I will follow but only push in arrogant way will not help. Never come back in the hospital. I prefer professional and I didnt find there.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: came here for finger sprain...Unexplained by team doctors why blood test is required and cost more than 3000 with waiting time of 6 hours..Total waiting consulting time of 6 -8 hours for finger sprain..Price varies from practo and actual..
